contest-event.event-date: May 13, 1972 D Midlands Area (Second Section) Midlands Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Second Sinfonietta [Horovitz] De Montfort Hall, Leicester, Leicestershire, England, UK From British Bandsman 20th May 1972 - 'By curious coincidence, the first, second and third prizewinners in the Second Section played in that order, thus shattering the alleged theoretical disadvantage of an early draw.' 15 bands competed.
